description.value:
Requirements You are wielding a crossbow with reload 1 or higher.

Your deep understanding of the crossbow allows you to reload efficiently while moving yourself out of the line of return fire. Either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Create a Diversion] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Take Cover], then Interact to reload. As normal, you must meet the requirements to Take Cover; you must be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone], benefiting from cover, or near a feature that allows you to Take Cover.
